posts.message: SSL Interruptions: good evening fellows, some of you might be aware/suffering from SSL-connections drops/interruptions. There are different problems reported among technical communities in Egypt over the past 9 days revolving around targeting SSL connections (VPNs targeting, packet drops, ssl mail server fail..etc). One clear thing is lack of understanding as we don't have a consistent pattern to talk about (examples of interruption include different IPs targeting, ISPs, mix of blocking techniques) and i cant tell for sure what is going on. I have seen and spoke with ppl who are going through total VPN-drops, frequent ssl-mail-server fail..etc and some companies/institutions have total vpn failure for the last 48hrs till now. Basically there are different difficulties related to secure connections but no solid explanation yet and no hint what is going on.. the general sense of course is SSL interception either by MITM-server or DPIs but no any sort of evidence so far. I thought of bringing it up here so we can share our problems we are going through and maybe our collective problems help in reaching a pattern to understand and hopefully resolve it, and maybe any of you can share a possible explanation. Thank you.

SA, 
Does anyone know how to download the youtube videos subtitles (closed caption)? 
I tried some command line tools like youtube-dl and youtube2srt but unfortunately it does not work with all of the videos.
For example the video in this link (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qmWCT_OgrKQ) contains closed caption but both youtube-dl and youtube2srt say the video does not have subtitle.
Can anyone at least explain why these tools can not download the subtitles from such videos? Is it a restriction set by the video owner or what?

صباح الخير 
ممكن  لو حد اخد دبلومة علوم الحاسب بمعهد الدراسات والبحوث  الإحصائية  بجامعة القاهرة  يفيدنى بتجربته فيه ؟! ... كانت  مفيده او لا ؟! ..  فرقت معاه فى حاجه ؟! .. انا من الزقازيق  فصعب انى انتظم ف الحضور  .. هل ده هيأثر ؟! .. وهل  حوار ان نسبة الحضور لا تقل عن 75 % ده .. مجرد كلام ولا  فيه تدقيق شديد ع الحضور  
؟!  ... بالنسبة لى في صعوبات كتير  بحاول احلها فى سبيل الدبلومه دى .. فمش عاوزه فى الاخر  .. يطلع على مفيش واطلع حاجه متستهلش و الاستفاده تبقى تعبانه  .

how can a freelancer without any full-time job get an actual stable job ?, maybe to narrow the answers possibilities my main concern is about how to implement your portfolio page into your cv ?

PS:: I Googled my question but I just don't get the answers so it would be helpful if someone can explain it in plain English 
Thanks in advance.

مساء الخير، 
بشتغل حالياً على project معين وبستخدم فيه Laravel 5 وده تالت مشروع اعمله بإستخدام الـ framework ده، وبالنسبالي دي أول تجربة ليا مع الـ back-end development 
قبلها كان عندي شوية خبرة بسيطة في الـ competitive programming وكنت بشتغل بـ Basic:medium features of C++ 

بعد ما كنت بستخدم C++ وفجأة بقيت بستخدم حاجات زي الـ eloquent models ومفهوم ان الـ framework بيـ handle حاجات كتير مش هتتعرض ليها مش عارف ليه بقيت حاسس اني Googler مش programmer، هل استخدام الـ frameworks بدون استخدام الـ root technology نفسها ممكن يبقى استخدام خاطئ ليها؟ 

وهل في reference معين بيتكلم عن الـ big picture للـ back-end development وبيتناول نظرياً المفاهيم المتعلقة بيه؟ 
المفاهيم اللي مش متعلقة بـ technology معينة.
